price: Bityo, singiza ishimwe rya Nyagasani wawe kandi ube mu bamwubamira.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
